meanings.definition: (UK) National Radiological Protection Board (英国の国立放射線防護委員会 - 2005年にHPAに統合)
meanings.english_definition: (UK) A former UK governmental organization responsible for radiological protection standards and research. It was absorbed into the Health Protection Agency (HPA) in 2005.

examples.sentence: The NRPB issued guidelines on exposure to radiation.
examples.translation: NRPBは放射線被ばくに関するガイドラインを発行した。

etymology.value: Acronym of National Radiological Protection Board
